review: I am so thankful to Dr. Nimmi for helping me overcome my PCOS journey - the right way. I am in my late 20s and have been struggling with PCOS symptoms including hair fall, hair on my neck, obesity, among others. Dr. Nimmi really understood my pains, and guided me on sustainable ways of overcoming this disease - and with her continued support, I have seen amazing results.

I had a consultation with Dr. Nimmi Mahajan and I am extremely pleased with the experience. I struggle to find a good gynecologist as this can be an intimate experience. But she heard my concerns, put me to ease, explained the prognosis, the line of treatment and answered all my questions. Highly recommend her.
The doctor was quite calm and non-judgemental. She made me feel safe, calm & collected. Even when I cried, she gave me tissues and reassured me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctors experience is very good. His suggestion is Very good and his treatment charge is also very less.
